name: NSPDFInfo
desc: An object that stores information associated with the creation of a PDF file, such as its URL, tag names, page orientation, and paper size.

items.name: var url: URL?
items.desc: The URL identifying the location at which the PDF file will be created.

items.name: var isFileExtensionHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the file extension should appear after the filename.

items.name: var tagNames: [String]
items.desc: An array of tag names that should be applied to the PDF file after itâ€™s created.

items.name: var orientation: NSPrintInfo.PaperOrientation
items.desc: The paper orientation to use when exporting content as a PDF file.

items.name: var paperSize: NSSize
items.desc: The paper size to use when exporting content as a PDF file.

items.name: var attributes: NSMutableDictionary
items.desc: A dictionary of additional attributes that describe how to export content as a PDF file.
